name: A. Bear and Poker
statement:
Limak is an old brown bear. He often plays poker with his friends. Today
they went to a casino. There are players (including Limak himself) and
right now all of them have bids on the table. -th of them has bid with
size dollars.Each player can double his bid any number of times and
triple his bid any number of times. The casino has a great jackpot for
making all bids equal. Is it possible that Limak and his friends will
win a jackpot?
